title: RAD BI Developer
summary: Imagine what you could do here! At Apple, creative ideas have a way of becoming wonderful products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. The people here at Apple don’t just build products — they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it.
description: The APAC Operations BI team is looking for a highly motivated individual with excellent web development and database skills. This individual must possess excellent problem-solving and analytical skills and a proven track record of effectively translate business requirements into end-to-end technical solutions. The ideal candidate should also show a passion for business process optimization and challenging the status quo. Key responsibilities: - Design and build web applications to allow users to: *Visualize large datasets and KPIs. *Run complex simulations for forecasting and planning. *Manage workflow between business functions. - Design, develop, tune, and service SQL databases - Engaging with business users for business requirements - Developing enhancements to existing solutions - Production support for applications and databases
preferred_qualifications: Possesses an enthusiastic and positive work attitude. Knowledge of coding languages such as Java, Node JS is a plus. Experience in Docker and microservices architecture is a plus. Knowledge of building applications in the Supply Chain space preferred.
